alert.note: Alert for Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:14PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Madison and northwestern Gallatin Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 414 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Pony, or 15 miles north of Virginia City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pony, Harrison and Norris. This includes Highway 287 between mile markers 58 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for south central and southwestern Montana.
